subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[fly]]; to [[circle]] in the [[air]]; to [[soar]]
# to [[reverse]]; to [[flip]] over; to [[turn over]]; to [[toss]]
# to [[climb]] over or into; to [[cross over]]
# to [[rummage]] through; to [[look]] through
# to [[browse]]; to [[look over]]
# to [[change]]; to [[alter]]
# to [[translate]]; to [[interpret]]
# to [[decode]]; to [[decipher]]
# to [[fall out]]; to [[cease]] to be on [[friendly]] [[terms]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} {{zh-alt-form|返|faan1}}
